params.text: This performance measure is measured each grading period (typically 9 weeks).  The ETS Counselor will collect this data from either transcripts or Infinite Campus and will then enter the data into a tracking spreadsheet.  From the spreadsheet the % is calculated and entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 95%.

panels.title: % student participants with a GPA of 2.5+ per 9 weeks

params.text: This performance measure is measured each grading period (typically 9 weeks).  Rather than looking at student achievement, this measure looks at how much did we do? The ETS Counselor will keep track of how many students have received an Individual Development Plan counseling session or IDP and then determine the % of participants that have received a session during the grading period in question. The % is then entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 95%.

panels.title: % student participants receiving an IDP Session per 9 weeks

params.text: This performance measure is measured each grading period (typically 9 weeks). The ETS Counselor will collect this data from either transcripts or Infinite Campus and will then enter the data into a tracking spreadsheet.  From the spreadsheet the % is calculated and entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 10%.

panels.title: % student participants with more than 3 absences this 9 week grading period

params.text: This performance measure is measured monthly. The data comes from a monthly KHEAA download and cross-referenced with the reports available to the ETS Counselors. The Associate DIrector of TRiO usually enters this data into ScoreCard.The target for this performance measure is 90%.

panels.title: % senior participants who have completed the FAFSA

params.text: This peformance measure is measured monthly.  The ETS Counselor will collect this data from consultation with the student participants and enter it into a spreadsheet.  From the spreadsheet the % is calculated and entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 90%.

panels.title: % senior participants who have applied to 3 colleges

params.text: This peformance measure is measured monthly.  The ETS Counselor will collect this data from consultation with the student participants and enter it into a spreadsheet.  From the spreadsheet the % is calculated and entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 90%.

This performance measure is measured each grading period (typically 9 weeks).  The ETS Counselor will collect this data from either transcripts or Infinite Campus and will then enter the data into a tracking spreadsheet.  From the spreadsheet the % is calculated and entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 70%.

panels.title: % seniors who have met benchmark on the ACT

params.text: This performance measure is measred each half year. The ETS Counselor will collect data from either transcripts or Infinite Campus and will then enter the data into a tracking spreadsheet.  From the spreadsheet the % is calculated and entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 60%.

panels.title: % of current TS high school participants enrolled in a rigorous course of study
